item.description:
We have something wonderful to share with you ~ please come and meet some of our wonderful members that inspire us and could inspire you!!

It will be a heart to heart gathering for Valentines Day. Write your favorite quote on a piece of paper to be pinned to your heart. Don't have a favorite quote, that is okay come anyway!

Wine and cheese will be provided ~ please bring a small appetizer to share.

Those of you we have not had the honor of meeting, please use this opportunity to come to the Larches Inn and meet this very inspirational group of woman ~ all ages and all walks of life. Come to meet everyone and relax at the end of the week.
item.name: A Heart to Heart for Valentines Day - Wine and Cheese
